knimeNode.name: Database Query
knimeNode.shortDescription: Modifies the input SQL query from a incoming database connection.

fullDescription.intro: Modifies the input SQL query from a incoming database connection. The SQL query is represented by the place holder #table# and will replaced during execute. The new database connection then available at the out-port. The database connection settings itself are not modified.
fullDescription.option:
Enter a new database query. Don't removed the #table# place holder which represents the incoming SQL statement.
Additional SQL commands (create, drop, set parameter, etc.) can be arrange in front of the actual SELECT statement and are execute together line-by-line during configure and execute. Note, those additional SQL commands need to be separated by semicolon.

ports.outPort: Database connection with wrapped SQL query
